'''Jacquelyn Williams Blott''' is a [https://www.texasbar.com/AM/Template.cfm?Section=Find_A_Lawyer&template=/Customsource/MemberDirectory/MemberDirectoryDetail.cfm&ContactID=168217 Texas licensed attorney] from Round Rock who graduated from South Texas College of Law in 1989. She entered her appearance into the [[Texas Sandy Hook Lawsuit (Heslin v. Jones)|Sandy Hook]] cases on [https://research.txcourts.gov/CourtRecordsSearch/#!/case/d9dabe298fc452cbbeb76647cb0f30c6 January 11, 2022] and the [[Texas Parkland Shooting Lawsuit (Fontaine v. Jones)|Fontaine]] case on [https://research.txcourts.gov/CourtRecordsSearch/#!/case/a50cd3d78199542b9ad0166d23fb53ef January 31, 2022]. She would go on to spar with both [[Bill Ogden]] and [[Mark Bankston]] in depositions where she represented Kit Daniels ([[664: Formulaic Objections Part 5|Formulaic Objections Part 5]]) and InfoWars Corporate Representative [[Brittany Paz]] ([[685: Formulaic Objections Part 7|Formulaic Objections Part 7]]). During the latter deposition, Ms. Blott couldn't figure out how to turn off her phone, and unintentionally activated Siri on the record, which startled her causing her to swear.
